name: @vladmandic/sdnext
description: SD.Next: All-in-one WebUI for AI generative image and video creation
author: Vladimir Mandic <mandic00@live.com>

scripts.packages: . venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade transformers accelerate huggingface_hub safetensors tokenizers peft compel pytorch_lightning pylint ruff
scripts.pylint: . venv/bin/activate && pylint *.py modules/ pipelines/ scripts/ extensions-builtin/ | grep -v '^*'
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run format && npm run ruff && npm run pylint | grep -v TODO
scripts.todo: npm run pylint | grep W0511 | awk -F'TODO ' '{print "- "$NF}' | sed 's/ (fixme)//g' | sort
